content:
✅ Approved the contribution.
Comment: Simple yet mathematically intriguing.

✅ Approved the contribution.
Comment: Good problem, it'll be fun to see the shortest possible solution.

Dear Mystalgine,

nice problem, but the Goal statement is not clear. I was not able to understand what must be done without looking at the example, rereading the goal statement and looking at the example again.

The first line is ok, rewrite the rest to make it more clear. 

Remove the c==0 case.

Is there a need to have a special case to output "x" when c == 0?
I think the problem is good by itself, and this addition feels unnecessary for me.

Input section
* "number" is not a constant; it's just part of the description of the variable c. Please format it as bold instead of as a constant if needed.

Output section
* Please specify that the numbers should be space separated.
* Please specify the possibility of outputing "x".

Cases
* Except for the edge case of c = 0, please revise the tests and validators so that there are no duplicates.

Thanks.

Thank you for your feedback, I will see to it right away.
Also, c = 19 is an edge case too, so I suppose I will leave it as is.
